entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 this evening. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
